channel.title: I need the ::npcreset command for my server
channel.description:
Hi,
I don't have a dodian server, I want it for my server ( That is not Dodian ), does anyone have the command for this?
With thanks.
Music

item.title: I need the ::npcreset command for my server
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Wtf, none of you people can code… Its obvious what the error is… Your setting up a for method but you havn’t told it to do anything after…

This took me a whole 30 seconds to fix and test… -.-

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset")) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "I own pking just wooped your npc's"; }

Read full topic

item.title: I need the ::npcreset command for my server
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Music, replace the dodian methods with yours.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2008, 05:09:33 AM[/size][hr] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && (playerRights > 0)) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }

Should be something like:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && (playerRights > 0)) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } PlayerHandler.messageToAll("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }

Or something lol.

Read full topic

This is for dodian:

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: I need the ::npcreset command for my server
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.startsWith("smsg") && (playerRights == 2)) { yell(command.substring(5)); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && (playerRights > 0)) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }
